jd: From: Salil, Smart Source Technologies salil.s@smartsourcetec.com Reply to: salil.s@smartsourcetec.com Title: Web Applications Developer (remote option)Work authorization: any (candidate must be authorized to work in US)Must-have skills: 2+ y ASP.NET; Angular or React; SQL Server or Oracle; ETL, Data Warehousing, Operational Data Stores, Data Lakes, and Master Data ManagementLocation: Tallahassee, FLPLEASE SEND LOCAL CANDIDATES ONLY (registered and currently located in Tallahassee, FL).Candidates from other locations won’t be considered. Relocation is not acceptableEstimated Duration: 6 months with possible extension​(s)Additional information: The candidate should be able to provide an ID if the interview is requested. The candidate interviewing must be the same individual who will be assigned to work with our client. Requirements:• Availability to work 3 days per week at the Client’s site in Tallahassee, FL (required);• Experience in ASP.NET, Javascript UI libraries such as Angular and React, Backend databases such as SQL Server and Oracle, and on-premises and cloud based (Azure) platforms (2+ years);• Experience in software development and agile best practices.Preferred:• Experience in various development platforms and full stack development;• Experience in the SCRUM Framework;• Experience in the financial systems such as an ERP;• Experience with data management concepts such as ETL, Data Warehousing, Operational Data Stores, Data Lakes, and Master Data Management.
